title: Hawkwind 1988-07-30 (AOC) - Barnstaple Armada Rock Festival -FLA
description:
A torrent for the MP3 files was posted on this site 30 hours ago. These FLAC files are a re-seed from Dime. 

Hawkwind as Agents of Chaos (AOC) - popularly known as HawkDog. A mixture of Hawkwind and Tubilah Dog. Includes Brock, Bainbridge and Richards.

Quality 8, but dips in a few places.

The person saying "you wanna toke?" at 03:09 into Motorway City is me! It was a spliff containing high-grade oil, that I&#039;d just lit, when someone passed by and stopped for a minute. There are a few short breaks in the recording, due to someone treading on my tape recorder, me fotgetting to flip the cassette tape, and a couple of mechanical failures. But over 95% of the gig is here.

1988-07-30: Barnstaple - Armada Rock Festival, North Devon, UK. Until this week, this recording was not available to anyone!

01 intro & Right Stuff
02 Psychedelic Warlords
03 Safe Zone  [Tubilah Dog song] - bit missing in middle.
04 Step Down [Tubilah Dog song]
05 Motorway City - Assault - Spirit of the Age
06 City of Tiny Lights [Frank Zappa cover] - tape ran out.

07 ? [poss Tubilah Dog song]
08 Lucifer Sam [Pink Floyd cover] 
09 Sonic Attack
10 Lost Chronicles -instrumental
11 Needle Gun
12 Shot Down in the Night
